<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A simple and fast domtree-based CSE pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass does a simple depth-first walk over the dominator tree,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// eliminating trivially redundant instructions and using instsimplify to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// canonicalize things as it goes. It is intended to be fast and catch obvious</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cases so that instcombine and other passes are more effective. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expected that a later pass of GVN will catch the interesting/hard cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#ab1e42734fad92b888f44ac4c1632d925">EarlyCSEPass</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;EarlyCSEPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#ab1e42734fad92b888f44ac4c1632d925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#ab1e42734fad92b888f44ac4c1632d925">EarlyCSEPass</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#a252b30b033be08d6ae29481bb6b9da48">UseMemorySSA</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#a252b30b033be08d6ae29481bb6b9da48">UseMemorySSA</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/earlycsepass/#a252b30b033be08d6ae29481bb6b9da48">UseMemorySSA</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
